    • Method Detail

      • addService

        public void addService(EditText title,
              EditText description,
              Category category,
              CheckBox isPrivate,
              java.util.List<Bitmap> pictures)
        This function takes the inputted information and converts it into a Service object in the database
        Parameters:
        title - this is the string value of the Service's title passed as a EditText from the AddServiceActivity there are no character restrictions. Ex "Write JavaDoc"
        description - this is a description of the service passed as an EditText from the AddServiceActivity that a user writes to better describe the service to other users. Ex "I write excellent JavaDoc for java projects. This includes descriptions and examples of different variables and functions. And I don't forget about runime."
        category - is the category of a Service. Category objects are used by User's to better focus their search results.Category objects have a string title. Ex "Computers"
        isPrivate - is the setting that allows a user to keep a Service unsearchable by other Users. It is passed as a CheckBox from AddServiceActivity . For example User Bob might want to keep his "Write JavaDoc" private because it is highly in demand. This way he isn't spammed by 301 students but is still able to offer his service to other User's who have a service that he wants.

      • cloneService

        public void cloneService(java.lang.String title,
                java.lang.String description,
                Category category,
                java.util.List<Bitmap> pictures)
        This function takes the inputted information and converts it into a Service object in the database
        Parameters:
        title - this is the string value of the Service's title passed as a EditText
        description - this is a description of the service passed as an EditText
        category - is the category of a Service.

      • editService

        public void editService(EditText title,
               EditText description,
               Category category,
               CheckBox isPrivate,
               java.lang.String id,
               java.util.List<Bitmap> pictures)
        This function takes the inputted information from the AddServiceActivity and converts it into a service object in the database
        Parameters:
        title - see above
        description - "" ""
        category - "" ""
        isPrivate - "" ""
        id - this is the existing service ID of the Service which is being edited. This is used to edit information instead of creating a new Service.

      • deleteService

        public void deleteService(java.lang.String id)
        This function deletes a selected service
        Parameters:
        id - This is the service ID of the service which is being deleted
